channel.title: Careers on Edi-Par Quantum
channel.description: Recent content in Careers on Edi-Par Quantum

item.title: Careers
item.description: Hiring drive We are on the lookout for researchers with expertise in, but not limited to the following areas: Quantum Machine Learning (QML) Quantum Algorithms Optimisation Benchmarking Opportunities available Senior researcher (Grade 8 Postdoc) Grade 8, salary range: £45,585 - £54,395 College of Science and Engineering, School of Informatics Fixed-term, Full time (35 hours) Available for 24 months (The duration of the position could be extended upon the successful approval of a grant extension.
